content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and transport belts at positions ((-16.5, -51.5), (-15.5, -51.5))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and transport belts at positions ((-14.5, -51.5), (-13.5, -51.5), (-15.5, -51.5))

### Iron plate production at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) with coal fuel and iron ore input
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) that puts iron ore into the furnace
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) that takes iron plate from the furnace
-  Belt group that connects the furnace to the inserter

### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) that puts items into the chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill without fuel
-  Make sure to have coal in the inventory before using a burner mining drill
### Errors when placing entities without a sink entity
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output before placing an entity
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
-  Make sure to have iron ore in the inventory before using a furnace
### Errors when using inserter without source items
-  Ensure there are source items available before using an inserter

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   No important variables have been assigned.
